whyCantIDeleteTheCurrentProfile: Why can't I delete the current profile?
youCanDeleteTheCurrentProfileIf: You can! But first you must be using a different profile than the one you want to delete. When you come back to the settings page the delete button should be available.

passwordRules: Your new password must contain a minimum of 5 letters, at least 1 upper case letter, 1 lower case letter, 1 numeric character and one special character.

welcomeInfo5: Once you are inside, you will be able to create more profiles for your other pets!
